alert.note: Alert for Bath; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Powell, Montgomery, southeastern Bath, Menifee and northwestern Wolfe Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Camargo, or near Mount Sterling, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jeffersonville, Lucky Stop, Oggs Station, Bean and Peeled Oak around 335 PM EDT. Clay Lick, Cedar Groves, Means, Hope, Walkers Crossing, Crooks and Preston around 340 PM EDT. Rothwell, Cornwell, Fagan and Olympia Springs around 345 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Frenchburg, Campsites in the Indian Creek area of the Daniel Boone National Forrest, Sudith, Tabor, Young Springs, Ratlitt and Mariba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
